description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Phpbits Creative Studio Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.6.

product.name: Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress
Easy Login Styler – White Label Admin Login Page for WordPress
